history.proof: intros d. pose proof rec_empty d as lr. apply sem_listes_2 in lr as lr_eq. sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: pose proof rec_empty d as lr.
apply sem_listes_2 in lr as lr_eq.
exceptions.exn: Abstracting over the term "prec_empty" leads to a term fun p : prec_list => u_conv_lr_1 d p tnil (rec_empty d) which is ill-typed. Reason is: Illegal application: The term "u_conv_lr_1" of type "forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop" cannot be applied to the terms "d" : "preDTA" "p" : "prec_list" "tnil" : "term_list" "rec_empty d" : "liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil" The 4th term has type "liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil" which should be coercible to "liste_reconnait d p tnil".

original: intros d. pose proof rec_empty d as lr. apply sem_listes_2 in lr as lr_eq. rewrite lr_eq. apply u_conv0_2r.
